abstract: Pledges Amer unit full support to Brit Save the Children Fund
snippet: Various agencies here continued yesterday with their efforts to raise funds to bring European children to this continent, to provide relief for refugees and other war sufferers and to buy ambulances to send to England....

headline.main: BRITISH GROUP ASKS AID FOR CHILDREN; Save the Children Federation Redoubles Efforts Here

lead_paragraph: Various agencies here continued yesterday with their efforts to raise funds to bring European children to this continent, to provide relief for refugees and other war sufferers and to buy ambulances to send to England.
